ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 182
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard that you can hex edit the Tutorial.exe so that you can view any zone in the game free of mobs.  I was just wondering how exactly you do that.  What
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard that you can hex edit the Tutorial.exe so that you can view any
zone in the game free of mobs. I was just wondering how exactly you do
that. What files to open with what, which lines of code to replace, etc.
Thanks in advance.


________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________

Hi there.. there is a program called "Eze" that you can use to hex edit the
game without having to wory about the actual hex. it's all done though the
interface. you may have to edit the config and things, and the drawbacks are
some zones aren't accessable, because the tutorial starts at 0,0 and that's
not in some zones, and that you are ahuman that can only walk, but the
advantages are you can explor kedge and not worry about drowning, and you
can explore MM without pulling the entire zone. =)

Gikkwiny, 20th warrior on Quellious
